titles.title: To amend the Small Tracts Act to facilitate the exchange of small tracts of land, and for other purposes.
To authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to carry out certain land exchanges involving small parcels of National Forest System land in the Tahoe National Forest in the State of California.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Resources, and in addition to the Committee on Agriculture, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health Discharged.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 108-666, Part I.
House Committee on Agriculture Granted an extension for further consideration ending not later than Sept. 8, 2004.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 406.

action.text: Mr. Radanovich moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 4617.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 9/28/2004--Passed House amended. Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to convey parcels of National Forest System land in the Tahoe National Forest in California to Irving N. Christensen and Dennis W. McCreary and Cindy M. McCreary in exchange for certain parcels of land owned by such individuals.
